title: Scout Analytics Interactive Walkthrough
description: Learn to navigate Philippine FMCG retail intelligence with LearnBot

steps.title: üéì Welcome to Scout Analytics
steps.content: This interactive walkthrough will teach you to master Philippine FMCG retail intelligence. Click 'Next' to begin your journey!
steps.voice_text: Welcome to Scout Analytics! I'm LearnBot, your AI guide to Philippine retail intelligence.

steps.title: üéØ Global Filter System
steps.content: This is your command center. Use filters to focus on specific regions, time periods, brands, or categories. All dashboard data updates in real-time!
steps.voice_text: The filter bar is your command center. Use it to focus on specific data segments.

steps.title: üìä Dashboard Navigation
steps.content: Navigate between 6 core sections: Overview for KPIs, Product Mix for category analysis, Consumer Insights for demographics, and more.
steps.voice_text: Use the sidebar to navigate between different dashboard sections.

steps.title: üí∞ Key Performance Indicators
steps.content: These KPI cards show your most important metrics. Hover over them to see period comparisons and trends. Green arrows mean growth!
steps.voice_text: KPI cards display your key metrics. Hover to see trends and comparisons.

steps.title: üìà Revenue Trends
steps.content: This chart shows daily revenue patterns. Look for spikes during promotions or dips that need attention. Click data points for details!
steps.voice_text: Revenue charts reveal daily patterns and trends in your business performance.

steps.title: ü§ñ AI-Powered Insights
steps.content: Scout AI automatically analyzes your data and provides actionable insights. These update based on your current filters and time range.
steps.voice_text: AI insights provide automatic analysis and recommendations based on your data.

steps.title: üé® TBWA Brand Intelligence
steps.content: Yellow accents highlight TBWA brands (Oishi, Del Monte, Champion) and key insights. Orange elements indicate premium or important features.
steps.voice_text: Yellow and orange accents highlight TBWA brands and premium features.

steps.title: üåç Philippine Regional Data
steps.content: All data covers 17 Philippine regions. Use region filters to compare NCR vs provinces, or analyze specific markets like CALABARZON.
steps.voice_text: Regional analysis covers all 17 Philippine regions for comprehensive market insights.

steps.title: üì¶ Product Categories
steps.content: Navigate to Product Mix to see category breakdowns: Beverages üßÉ, Snacks üçø, Dairy ü•õ, Personal Care üß¥, and more with emoji indicators.
steps.voice_text: Product categories are organized with intuitive emoji indicators for easy navigation.

steps.title: üë• Customer Intelligence
steps.content: Consumer Insights reveals age groups, gender distribution, income brackets, and payment preferences across different regions.
steps.voice_text: Consumer insights reveal demographic patterns and customer behavior across regions.

steps.title: üè™ Yummy FMCG Agent
steps.content: Yummy Intelligence specializes in inventory monitoring, promotion analysis, and competitive intelligence. Perfect for FMCG category management!
steps.voice_text: Yummy Intelligence provides specialized FMCG analysis including inventory and competitor monitoring.

steps.title: üí¨ AI Chat Assistants
steps.content: Two AI modes: Yummy Intelligence for FMCG-specific questions, and Enhanced Scout for general retail analytics. Ask natural language questions!
steps.voice_text: Chat with AI assistants using natural language for instant insights and recommendations.

steps.title: ‚úÖ Live Production Data
steps.content: All data is live and production-ready from 5,000 real FMCG transactions across Philippine retail stores. No mock data here!
steps.voice_text: All dashboard data comes from real FMCG transactions in Philippine retail stores.

steps.title: üìä Data Export & Analysis
steps.content: Export filtered data as CSV from the All Transactions page. Perfect for deeper analysis in Excel or sharing with your team.
steps.voice_text: Export capabilities let you download filtered data for offline analysis.

steps.title: üéØ Pro Filter Tips
steps.content: Combine filters for powerful insights: Try 'Last 30 days + NCR + TBWA brands' for executive reporting, or 'Beverages + All regions + Competitors' for market analysis.
steps.voice_text: Combine multiple filters to create powerful, targeted business insights.

steps.title: üèÜ Walkthrough Complete!
steps.content: You're now ready to explore Scout Analytics! Remember: Use filters first, ask AI assistants questions, and look for yellow/orange highlights for TBWA insights. Happy analyzing! üöÄ
steps.voice_text: Congratulations! You've completed the Scout Analytics walkthrough. Start exploring with your own business questions!
